description: Creates an IAM role that is linked to a specific AWS service. The service controls the attached policies and when the role can be deleted.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Creating a service-linked role establishes a new identity in the environment that could be leveraged as part of an attack infrastructure.

incidents.description: GuardDuty Extended Threat Detection uncovers cryptomining campaign on Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateServiceLinkedRole to create roles required for services like Auto Scaling as part of setting up infrastructure for resource hijacking.
